Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 65 Grove is part of the thriving ‘live, work, play’ community in Watertown with premier retail, residences and hotels within walking distance.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Generous lobby with ample seating, covered garage with free parking for tenants and visitors, dedicated shuttle service connecting to the MBTA red line, fitness center, showers and locker rooms, exterior landscaping, and access to Watertown Greenway.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Office & Lab Building in Watertown

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: West Cambridge's Newest Life Science Campus

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Great Accessibility to Northern Talent Pool

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Situated at the intersection of Interstate 95 and Route 3, Nexus connects with vibrant surroundings, like-minded corporate neighbors and unparalleled access. With a best-in-class development opportunity you maintain optimal flexibility to showcase your rand in a high-profile location, where research and development seamlessly intersect. Burlington is unlocking a new interchange for the Life Science community and Nexus is the key to unlock this potential\Drive time from urban life science hubs of West Cambridge, East Cambridge and Boston is roughly equivalent to drive times to the Waltham suburbs. However, Burlington has far greater accessibility to the northern talent pool, providing additional opportunities for talent acquisition/retention.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in Burlington, 43 South Avenue is a 190,000 SF building situated on 5.8 acres of land. The building is fully permitted for lab-ready use. Available June 2023

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unique Headquarters Location at Nexus Burlington Lab-Ready Layout

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 72,000 SF contiguous available between 62 & 78 Fourth Avenue buildings
150 Surface Spaces are available; Ratio of 5.03/1,000 SF
Roof mounted HVAC gas fired units. Rubber membrane roof.
Term through 3/31/2022 (longer term direct deal available)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at intersection of Totten Pond Rd and Rt 95. Close to Massachusetts Turnpike (Route 90) and Route 2.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Minutes from the Westin Hotel, daycare facilities, a wellness center and health club, public transportation, cafeteria, restaurants, banks, and convenience shopping. Great views.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 30,000 SF of Flex Space for Sublease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: With prominent visibility from Route 3 at Exit 26, 201 Burlington Road offers unparalleled access to the region’s central highways, Route 3 and Route 128. Situated in the center of the Route 128/Route 3 tech corridor, 201 Burlington Road enjoys easy access to the Boston metropolitan business community and labor force as well as direct access to downtown Boston and Logan Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
201 Burlington Road offers an exciting leasing opportunity located at the heart of suburban Boston’s most dynamic submarket on the Burlington/Bedford line, in Bedford,
Massachusetts. 201 Burlington Road is a modern facility, which can accommodate
a variety of uses for today’s evolving tenant needs. The new 201 Burlington Road is the perfect environment for tenants who desire state-of-the-art space that also offers true on/off highway access while benefitting from a vibrant corporate, retail and residential environment.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: First Class | Fully Renovated Office & Life Sciences Space

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Subdividable to 13,500 SF or 6,449 SF or 9,084 SF

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Lexington Crossing is located in the heart of the Route 128 technology corridor at the interchange of Routes 128 and 4/225 and offers tenants a unique and highly sought after location.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The five-building campus totals 360,000 SF of office space. With a full complement of area amenities, the campus is adjacent to Hanscom Air Force Base and is easily accessible from all directions.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 101,000 SF of Class A Office/Lab Space in Lexington
